document.full_text: a military standoff on the world's highest battlefield is the focus of a fresh round of talks between india and pakistan, and any progress on one of the least thorny issues may give a boost to a tortuous peace process between the nuclear-armed rivals.
document.title: icy battlefield focus of india, pakistan talks
lines_and_colors: a military standoff on the world's highest battlefield is the focus of a fresh round of talks between india and pakistan, and any progress on one of the least thorny issues may give a boost to a tortuous peace process between the nuclear-armed rivals.
